lines.speaker: Provider
lines.text: What brings you in today?

lines.speaker: Patient
lines.text: I've been extremely tired for two to three months. No matter how much I sleep I wake up exhausted. And I've gained weight without changing my diet.

lines.speaker: Provider
lines.text: How much weight have you gained?

lines.speaker: Patient
lines.text: About 15 pounds in the last three months with no changes in eating or exercise.

lines.speaker: Provider
lines.text: How many hours of sleep are you getting?

lines.speaker: Patient
lines.text: Eight to 9 hours but I still need more. I could nap anytime during the day.

lines.speaker: Provider
lines.text: Any changes in your skin, hair, or sensitivity to cold?

lines.speaker: Patient
lines.text: My skin is really dry and flaky. My hair seems thinner. And I'm always cold even when everyone else is comfortable.

lines.speaker: Provider
lines.text: Any changes in mood or concentration?

lines.speaker: Patient
lines.text: I feel foggy and can't think clearly. I've been feeling down and not interested in things I usually enjoy.

lines.speaker: Provider
lines.text: Any swelling in your face, hands, or feet?

lines.speaker: Patient
lines.text: My face looks puffy in the mornings. My rings are feeling tight.

lines.speaker: Provider
lines.text: Any changes in your menstrual cycle?

lines.speaker: Patient
lines.text: My periods have been heavier and more irregular. They used to be very regular.

lines.speaker: Provider
lines.text: Family history of thyroid problems?

lines.speaker: Patient
lines.text: My mother and sister both have hypothyroidism. My mom takes Synthroid.

lines.speaker: Provider
lines.text: Any constipation?

lines.speaker: Patient
lines.text: Yes, I used to go every day and now it's every three days.

lines.speaker: Provider
lines.text: I'd like to order thyroid function tests.

lines.speaker: Patient
lines.text: That makes sense given my family history.
